detailed.description: Setting this to true causes parameter details to be dumped in addition to API calls
detailed.name: Detailed Output

file.description: Setting this to true indicates that output should be written to file instead of stdout
file.name: Output to File

flush.description: Setting this to true causes IO to be flushed after each API call that is written
flush.name: Flush

indent_size.description: Specifies the number of spaces that a tab is equal to
indent_size.name: Indent Size

log_filename.description: Specifies the file to dump to when output files are enabled
log_filename.name: Log Filename

name_size.description: The number of characters the name of a variable should consume, assuming more are not required
name_size.name: Name Size

no_addr.description: Setting this to true causes "address" to be dumped in place of hex addresses
no_addr.name: Hide Addresses

output_format.name: Output Format
output_format.description: Specifies the format used for output; can be Text (default -- outputs plain text), Html, or Json

output_range.description: Comma separated list of frames to output or a range of frames with a start, count, and optional interval separated by a dash. A count of 0 will output every frame after the start of the range. Example: "5-8-2" will output frame 5, continue until frame 13, dumping every other frame. Example: "3,8-2" will output frames 3, 8, and 9.
output_range.name: Output Range

show_shader.description: Setting this to true causes the shader binary code in pCode to be also written to output
show_shader.name: Show Shader

show_timestamp.description: Show the timestamp of function calls since start in microseconds
show_timestamp.name: Show Timestamp

show_types.description: Setting this to true causes types to be dumped in addition to values
show_types.name: Show Types

type_size.description: The number of characters the name of a type should consume, assuming more are not required
type_size.name: Type Size

use_spaces.description: Setting this to true causes all tab characters to be replaced with spaces
use_spaces.name: Use Spaces
